sqls.sql: SELECT ss_tbl5_f1, ss_tbl5_f2, ss_tbl5_f3, ss_tbl5_f4, ss_tbl5_f5, ss_tbl5_f6, ss_tbl5_f7, ss_tbl5_f8, ss_tbl5_f9, ss_tbl5_f10, ss_tbl5_f11, ss_tbl5_f12, ss_tbl5_f13, ss_tbl5_f14, ss_tbl5_f15, ss_tbl5_f16, ss_tbl5_f17, ss_tbl5_f18, ss_tbl5_f19, ss_tbl5_f20, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM ss_tbl5 WHERE ss_tbl5_id = @ss_tbl5_id;
